generator.group: Centre for Ophthalmology and Visual Science, The University of Western Australia

contact.group: Centre for Ophthalmology and Visual Science, The University of Western Australia

publications.title: Generation of three induced pluripotent stem cell lines from an isolated inherited retinal dystrophy patient with RCBTB1 frameshifting mutations

donor.disease_description: Patient with late onset retinal dystrophy harbouring compound heterozygous mutations in the RCBTB1 gene (c.1706delG and c.707delA)

genomic_modifications.description: Compound heterozygous frameshift mutations in RCBTB1: c.1706delG (p.Gly569Glufs*12) and c.707delA (p.Asn236Thrfs*11)

genomic_characterisation.summary: Digital karyotyping demonstrated normal diploid karyotype (46,XX) at 1.0 Mb resolution.

induced_derivation.non_int_vector_name: Episomal plasmids containing OCT4, SOX2, KLF4, L-MYC, LIN28, shRNA for p53 and miR-302/367

ethics.institutional_HREC: University of Western Australia Human Research Ethics Committee
Sir Charles Gairdner Hospital Human Research Ethics Committee
